text: Se'i dina yakhana kapatacari o kapatacarinira balabe tadera yara bisbasa kareche -- ''amadera dike dekho to, tomadera aloka theke yena amara nite pari.’’ Bala habe -- ''tomara tomadera pechane phire ya'o ebam alora khomja kara.’’ Tarapara tadera madhye ekati de'oyala damra karano habe yate thakabe ekati daraja. Tara bhetarera dike, sekhane rayeche karuna, ara tara ba'irera dike, tara samane'i rayeche sasti.
